attributes.action: Challenge the way the Media portrays Muslims as Extremists or Terrorists.
attributes.additional_details: Over the past decade newspapers radio stations and news channels have continuously pumped negative stories about Muslims which leads to society holding these ideas about them.
attributes.background: I aim to set up a petition that will seek to garner support from people of all walks of life to sign in protest of the way the Media portrays Muslims in general as nothing more than "terrorists in waiting".

rejection.details:
We cannot accept your petition as you have not made it clear what specific action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take to address this issue.

We already have a petition asking the Government to legislate on this and you might want to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108252
